title: Practical Information
subtitle: Essential information for daily life in Dubai

tips.title: Weather Tips
tips.sunProtection: Always use sunscreen SPF 30+ when outdoors
tips.hydration: Drink plenty of water to stay hydrated
tips.dustStorms: Be prepared for occasional dust storms

seasonal.title: Seasonal Guide
seasonal.summerDesc: Very hot and humid, temperatures can reach 45°C
seasonal.winterDesc: Pleasant weather, ideal for outdoor activities

tips.title: Traffic Tips
tips.peakHours: Avoid peak hours: 7-9 AM and 5-8 PM
tips.salik: Salik toll gates charge AED 4 per crossing
tips.parking: Use RTA parking apps for easy payment
tips.carpooling: Carpooling lanes available on major highways

nolCard.title: Nol Card
nolCard.description: Unified payment card for all public transport
nolCard.benefit1: Works on metro, bus, tram, and water bus
nolCard.benefit2: Available in Silver, Gold, Blue, and Red categories
nolCard.benefit3: Can be topped up at stations and online

tips.title: Emergency Tips
tips.clearInfo: Provide clear information about the emergency
tips.location: Know your location or nearest landmark
tips.followInstructions: Follow all instructions from emergency services
